items.sentence: You don't really expect me to believe that, do you?
Tom washed two apples and gave one of them to Mary.
We don't believe Tom will be able to master French.
Tom sat over there all afternoon, waiting for Mary.
All three of those girls are taking ballet lessons.
Because my nephew was still young, he was forgiven.
How many of the words on that list didn't you know?
The closer you are to the sea, the windier it gets.
I still can't believe that you and Tom got married.
Tom believes the death penalty should be abolished.
